author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Wedding Showcase at Four Seasons Hotel HampshireTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Wedding Showcase at Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire
On Sunday, November 8, 2015, Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire will be hosting its second Wedding Showcase of the year, inviting guests to explore the stunning venue and meet a hand-picked selection of the very best luxury suppliers in the wedding industry.
Just an hour from central London, this intimate, historic retreat promises the Four Seasons touch with storybook charm and gracious, intuitive service. The Wedding Showcase will be the perfect opportunity for couples to meet a range of Britain’s finest craftsmen in the industry, while being treated to a glass of chilled champagne in the glorious grounds of Dogmersfield Park.
Featuring cake couturiers, top florists, chic furniture and wedding stationary suppliers, couture wedding dress designers, elegant photography and bridal hair and make-up, brides and grooms to be are sure to gain some quintessentially English inspiration for their special day.
Wedding Showcase Details
Guests can obtain further information from Emma Westacott, Wedding Manager emma.westacott@fourseasons.com or 01252 853 025
Event Timing 12:00 noon – 5:00 pm
Complimentariy admission and parking
No RSVP required
Exhibitors include: Blomster Designs, Paula Rooney Weddings, Wild at Heart, Wild About Flowers, Abigail Bloom, Cakes by Yevnig, GC Couture, Peggy Porschen, 3 Point, Bespoke Events, Revival Rooms, Acorn Furniture Hire, Velvet Living, Cutture, Armorial, Bubblegum Balloons, Jak, Eight Ray, Drinks Fusion, Suzie Turner, Kate Halfpenny, Ian Stuart, Your Little Secret, Jenny Knight, Prive by Gina Conway, Claire Hanson, Pippa MacKenzie, Stuart Wood
Event hashtag #FSShowcase
Source:-Four Seasons
